questions.question: What does GPIO stand for in the context of the Raspberry Pi?
Why is it necessary to use a resistor when connecting an LED to a Raspberry Pi?

answers.a: To limit the current and protect both the LED and the GPIO pin
answers.b: To enhance the brightness of the LED
answers.c: To stabilize the voltage supplied to the LED
answers.d: To slow down the blinking rate of the LED

questions.question: What are the possible power sources for the Raspberry Pi during this experiment?
What precaution should be taken before connecting hardware to a Raspberry Pi?

answers.a: Ensure the Raspberry Pi is powered off
answers.b: Keep the Raspberry Pi powered on
